Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 46th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2010...
Injured on 6/17/2010 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Minnesota to Pittsburgh on 1/31/2012 (Going to MIN: C S. Riggans. Going to PIT: LF J. Tabata)...
Injured on 4/13/2012 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/20/2013, off Oscar Villarreal (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/2013, off Chris Stratton (MIL)...
Injured on 9/13/2013 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/12/2018 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/2019 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles (A) on 5/7/2021 (Going to LAA: RF J. Tabata. Going to PIT: 2B R. Wright, P J. Axford)...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/17/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
